title: Defunct features (SLASH'EM)
data:
Over the years, some features have been removed from [SLASH](/wiki/SLASH "SLASH") and [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). These **defunct features** are listed below.

Many of these features were ported to [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

## List of defunct roles

The following roles from [NetHack--\_3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack--_3.0.10 "NetHack-- 3.0.10") were dropped entirely:

- [Drunk](/wiki/Drunk "Drunk")
- [Firefighter](/wiki/Firefighter "Firefighter")
- Geek (separate from the [Geek](/wiki/Geek "Geek") role in [NetHack: The Next Generation](/wiki/NetHack:_The_Next_Generation "NetHack: The Next Generation"))
- [Locksmith](/wiki/Locksmith "Locksmith")
- [Musician](/wiki/Musician "Musician")
- [Ninja (role)](/wiki/Ninja_\(role\) "Ninja (role)")
- [Officer](/wiki/Officer "Officer")
- [Undertaker](/wiki/Undertaker "Undertaker")
- [Zookeeper](/wiki/Zookeeper "Zookeeper")

The following roles were supplanted by [starting races](/wiki/Race "Race"). All the [quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest")-related features in the table are defunct unless marked otherwise.

| Role                                                                                | Quest                                                               | Quest artifact                                                                                       | Quest leader                                                               | Quest guardian                                            | Quest nemesis                                  |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| [Doppelganger](/wiki/Doppelganger_\(starting_race\) "Doppelganger (starting race)") | [Doppelganger quest](/wiki/Doppelganger_quest "Doppelganger quest") | [The Medallion of Shifters](/wiki/The_Medallion_of_Shifters "The Medallion of Shifters")             | [Master Shifter](/wiki/Master_Shifter "Master Shifter")                    | [Shifter](/wiki/Shifter "Shifter")                        | [Transmuter](/wiki/Transmuter "Transmuter")    |
| [Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)")                         | [Drow quest](/wiki/Drow_quest "Drow quest")                         | [The Tentacle Staff](/wiki/The_Tentacle_Staff "The Tentacle Staff")                                  | [Lolth](/wiki/Lolth_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Lolth (SLASH'EM)")                     | [drow](/wiki/Drow "Drow")†                                | [Earendil](/wiki/Earendil "Earendil")          |
| [Dwarf](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)")                      | [Dwarf quest](/wiki/Dwarf_quest "Dwarf quest")                      | [The Arkenstone](/wiki/The_Arkenstone "The Arkenstone")                                              | [Thorin](/wiki/Thorin "Thorin")                                            | [dwarf warrior](/wiki/Dwarf_warrior "Dwarf warrior")      | [Smaug](/wiki/Smaug "Smaug")                   |
| [Gnome](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)")                      | [Gnome quest](/wiki/Gnome_quest "Gnome quest")                      | [The Pick of Flandal Steelskin](/wiki/The_Pick_of_Flandal_Steelskin "The Pick of Flandal Steelskin") | [Ruggo the Gnome King](/wiki/Ruggo_the_Gnome_King "Ruggo the Gnome King")† | [gnome warrior](/wiki/Gnome_warrior "Gnome warrior")†     | [Lareth](/wiki/Lareth "Lareth")                |
| [Hobbit](/wiki/Hobbit_\(starting_race\) "Hobbit (starting race)")                   | [Hobbit quest](/wiki/Hobbit_quest "Hobbit quest")                   | [The One Ring](/wiki/The_One_Ring "The One Ring")                                                    | [Bilbo Baggins](/wiki/Bilbo_Baggins "Bilbo Baggins")                       | [proudfoot](/wiki/Hobbit_quest#proudfoots "Hobbit quest") | [Gollum](/wiki/Gollum "Gollum")                |
| [Lycanthrope](/wiki/Lycanthrope_\(starting_race\) "Lycanthrope (starting race)")    | [Lycanthrope quest](/wiki/Lycanthrope_quest "Lycanthrope quest")    | [The Staff of Withering](/wiki/The_Staff_of_Withering "The Staff of Withering")                      | [High Lycanthrope](/wiki/High_Lycanthrope "High Lycanthrope")              | [Fiend](/wiki/Fiend "Fiend")                              | [Sir Lorimar](/wiki/Sir_Lorimar "Sir Lorimar") |

(†) Not defunct

## Other defunct features

| Name                                                                               | Notes                                                                                                                                                                               |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Dao](/wiki/Dao "Dao")                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Efreeti](/wiki/Efreeti "Efreeti")                                                 |                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Lord Vlad the Impaler](/wiki/Lord_Vlad_the_Impaler "Lord Vlad the Impaler")       | quest nemesis for the [Undead Slayer quest](/wiki/Undead_Slayer_quest "Undead Slayer quest"), not to be confused with [Vlad the Impaler](/wiki/Vlad_the_Impaler "Vlad the Impaler") |
| [Marid](/wiki/Marid "Marid")                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Doughnut](/wiki/Doughnut "Doughnut")                                              | starting [comestible](/wiki/Comestible "Comestible") for the [Officer](/wiki/Officer "Officer") role                                                                                |
| [Expensive suit](/wiki/Expensive_suit "Expensive suit")                            | starting [shirt](/wiki/Shirt "Shirt") for the [Undertaker](/wiki/Undertaker "Undertaker") role                                                                                      |
| [Fire helmet](/wiki/Fire_helmet "Fire helmet")                                     | starting [helmet](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet") for the [Firefighter](/wiki/Firefighter "Firefighter") role                                                                                |
| [Orb of charging](/wiki/Orb_of_charging "Orb of charging")                         | commented out, now a [deferred feature](/wiki/Deferred_feature "Deferred feature")                                                                                                  |
| [Orb of destruction](/wiki/Orb_of_destruction "Orb of destruction")                | commented out, now a [deferred feature](/wiki/Deferred_feature "Deferred feature")                                                                                                  |
| [Orb of enchantment](/wiki/Orb_of_enchantment "Orb of enchantment")                | commented out, now a [deferred feature](/wiki/Deferred_feature "Deferred feature")                                                                                                  |
| [Sharpened pencil](/wiki/Sharpened_pencil "Sharpened pencil")                      | starting weapon for Geek role                                                                                                                                                       |
| [The Eye of Vecna](/wiki/The_Eye_of_Vecna "The Eye of Vecna")                      |                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [The Mantle of Knowledge](/wiki/The_Mantle_of_Knowledge "The Mantle of Knowledge") | [Monk](/wiki/Monk "Monk") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact"), replaced by the [Eyes of the Overworld](/wiki/Eyes_of_the_Overworld "Eyes of the Overworld")     |
| [Ugly backpack](/wiki/Ugly_backpack "Ugly backpack")                               |                                                                                                                                                                                     |

## See also

- [Defunct features](/wiki/Defunct_features "Defunct features") in vanilla NetHack

[![This article is unlikely to require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/58/Noversion.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article is unlikely to require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Defunct features (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Over the years, some features have been removed from SLASH and SLASH'EM. These defunct features are listed below.

Many of these features were ported to SlashTHEM.

List of defunct roles

The following roles from NetHack--_3.0.10 were dropped entirely:

  • Drunk
  • Firefighter
  • Geek (separate from the Geek role in NetHack: The Next Generation)
  • Locksmith
  • Musician
  • Ninja (role)
  • Officer
  • Undertaker
  • Zookeeper

The following roles were supplanted by starting races. All the quest-related features in the table are defunct unless marked otherwise.

Role Quest Quest artifact Quest leader Quest guardian Quest nemesis
Doppelganger Doppelganger quest The Medallion of Shifters Master Shifter Shifter Transmuter
Drow Drow quest The Tentacle Staff Lolth drow† Earendil
Dwarf Dwarf quest The Arkenstone Thorin dwarf warrior Smaug
Gnome Gnome quest The Pick of Flandal Steelskin Ruggo the Gnome King† gnome warrior† Lareth
Hobbit Hobbit quest The One Ring Bilbo Baggins proudfoot Gollum
Lycanthrope Lycanthrope quest The Staff of Withering High Lycanthrope Fiend Sir Lorimar

(†) Not defunct

Other defunct features

Name Notes
Dao
Efreeti
Lord Vlad the Impaler quest nemesis for the Undead Slayer quest, not to be confused with Vlad the Impaler
Marid
Doughnut starting comestible for the Officer role
Expensive suit starting shirt for the Undertaker role
Fire helmet starting helmet for the Firefighter role
Orb of charging commented out, now a deferred feature
Orb of destruction commented out, now a deferred feature
Orb of enchantment commented out, now a deferred feature
Sharpened pencil starting weapon for Geek role
The Eye of Vecna
The Mantle of Knowledge Monk quest artifact, replaced by the Eyes of the Overworld
Ugly backpack

See also

  • Defunct features in vanilla NetHack
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Defunct_features_(SLASH%27EM)&oldid=166887"

Over the years, some features have been removed from [[SLASH]] and [[SLASH'EM]]. These '''defunct features''' are listed below.

Many of these features were ported to [[SlashTHEM]].

==List of defunct roles==
The following roles from [[NetHack--_3.0.10]] were dropped entirely:
* [[Drunk]]
* [[Firefighter]]
* Geek (separate from the [[Geek]] role in [[NetHack: The Next Generation]])
* [[Locksmith]]
* [[Musician]]
* [[Ninja (role)]]
* [[Officer]]
* [[Undertaker]]
* [[Zookeeper]]

The following roles were supplanted by [[race|starting race]]s. All the [[quest]]-related features in the table are defunct unless marked otherwise.

|-
| [[Lycanthrope (starting race)|Lycanthrope]] || [[Lycanthrope quest]] || [[The Staff of Withering]] || [[High Lycanthrope]] || [[Fiend]] || [[Sir Lorimar]]
